page.title: 05Wincobank First Sch. Sheff.
page.content: Our school was built in{1884.}We have{226}pupils from 4-8 years old and {9}teachers. The stone building has{9} classrooms, a hall, a dining room, a staff room, office, medical room and head teacher's room. At lunchtime{115}children eat school dinners,{69}children bring sandwiches and{21}go home. We have two{computers} in the school and keep{goldfish}and { {stick insects}as pets. We do dancing and P.E. on apparatus. We have an{adventure playground} where there is a tunnel, three ladders, three ropes, a log house and a little fort to remind us of the fort on Wincobank Hill. We have been on school trips to a{ {zoo}and a{mill.}When we leave this school we go to{Concord Middle School. We like this school because we like the teachers and we like the work.
